commit.message: Begin process of creating image object up front.
Add image to database before calling add image task.
Create image object before running add image process

nodes.bodyText: More info in the message, please.

Let's indulge in a little code duplication for clarity, since by the time you get to this method, you have to keep looking back at the callers.
We can also give this another name to ease the cognitive burden of the overloads. Something like doAddImageProcess() or addImage() or addFilesForImage() whatever.

commit.message:
Image and ingest stream will be set up by each ImageDSProcessor.run() method.
Improve error message.
